example.eg: I thought it would be easy to find a job; I was wrong, though.
example.egtrans: 我以为要找份工作并不难。不过，我错了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 然而, 可是, 不过

example.eg: Though it was dark out, they went for a walk.
example.egtrans: 尽管外面很黑，他们还是去散步了。

example.eg: I wouldn't call him, though he begged me.
example.egtrans: 就算他求我，我也不会给他打电话的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 即使, 即便, 就算

example.eg: It appears as though your father is having a mid-life crisis.

dsense.name: as if on cue, as though on cue

example.eg: Tom was thinking about his mother when, as if on cue, she knocked on his front door.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 似乎得到暗示, 仿佛在暗示

example.eg: Jeff was staggering along the path as though he was drunk.
example.egtrans: 杰夫沿着小道蹒跚而行，就好像喝醉了。

example.eg: I decided to walk to the library even though it was raining.  Linda came to work even though she was sick.
example.egtrans: 尽管在下雨，我还是决定走路去图书馆。尽管琳达生病了，她还是来上了班。

dsense.name: make as if to do [sth], make as though to do [sth]

example.eg: He made as if to throw the ball, but he actually ran with it instead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 假装做某事, 佯装做某事

dsense.name: sound as though, sound as if

example.eg: It sounds as though you could do with a vacation!
example.egtrans: 听起来好像是你亟需休假！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好像, 仿佛, 似乎
